revised_title: Magnetical Observations in the West Indies, North Coast of Brazil, and North America
tldr: The author presents magnetical observations made in the West Indies, on the North Coast of Brazil, and North America between 1834 and 1837. The study aimed to determine the relative magnetic forces at various locations using different instruments and needles. The results were compared with the horizontal force at Plymouth, and the final conclusions were drawn based on the collected data.
